title: Question 20
prompt: Glen sells handmade musical triangles, and he wants to make triangular-shaped wooden boxes to package his instruments in. The boxes need to have 3 equal sides, 8 inches long. How many degrees do the angles at the corners of the boxes need to be?
description:
Click on the corresponding number in circles to select the correct answer.
Full grid instructions
feedback:
The correct answer is 60°. An triangle with three equal sides also has three equal angles. Since the three angles of a triangle equal 180° total, each angle in an equilateral triangle (a triangle with three equal sides) is 60°: 
<math><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>180</mn><mo>÷</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>60</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>
